subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Fabio Aru of Italy won the 11th stage of the Vuelta a España while Alberto Contador hung on to the overall lead by 20 seconds over Alejandro Valverde.
snippet: Fabio Aru of Italy won the 11th stage of the Vuelta a España while Alberto Contador hung on to the overall lead by 20 seconds over Alejandro Valverde.
